answers.answer: I just had mines a few days ago and honestly I was freaking out at first but it ended up not being as bad as everyone claims it to be . its just a sugary drink to test and see if you or the baby doesn't have diabetes , the drink is better when its cold and you have choices if they do let you chose go with the fruit punch flavor good luck

Basically you need to be fastening. Can't eat or drink nothing after 12:00am. When you go to your apt they'll give you a sugary drink to see if your diabetic. You have 5 mins to drink it and you cannot eat or drink nothing at all. It will be an hour wait at the waiting room till they call you to draw blood. I personally like the Orange drink and had it all 3 of my pregnancies. The fruit punch is to much that out of 2 I failed it.

Sadly I failed mine last week. I was so upset with myself and depressed that I started eating really healthy because with my 2 boys it passed like nothing. I was off by 2 points :/ well I had to take. 3 hour one this Monday that just pass and thank god I passed. I would've felt like I failed my daughter and myself. Just  try to drink a lot of water and eat veggies or salad til your 3 hours apt. Don't eat after 12am

question: I have my sugar test next month. What should k be expecting?
title: sugar test
